description: Sent when the signal status attribute of an

event.Summary: Signal status of interface $v2 on slot $v4, txPort $v5 is down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfTxSignalStatusDown LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfIndex u 9999 LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfName s EXAMPLE LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfSubrack u 0 LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfSlot u 0 LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfTxPort u 0 LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfRxPort u 0 LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfEntityId u 9999 LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfTxSignalStatus i 1

description: An arbitrary index assigned to each entry.
variables.name: LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfIndex

description: The management name of the interface, for
indicates sub-rack, the second slot number and
the third is the port number.
variables.name: LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfName

description: The number of the subrack where the interface
variables.name: LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfSubrack

description: The number of the slot where the interface is
variables.name: LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfSlot

description: The number of the port where the TX-side of
variables.name: LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfTxPort

description: The number of the port where the RX-side of
variables.name: LUM-ETH-MIB::ethIfRxPort

description: The operational state for outgoing (TX) signal
down - A fault that would lead to a protection
degraded - The signal quality is impaired.
